parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.04</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> global</value></part><part><name>Multiplayer Effects</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> local</value></part><part><name>Multiplayer Arguments</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Unit Control </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Set unit position rules. Mode may be one of: 
* '''"DOWN"''' - person goes prone and stays prone.
* '''"UP"''' - person stands and stays standing.
* '''"Middle"''' - Kneel Position. ArmA version 1.04
* '''"AUTO"''' - person chooses mode according to circumstances.

</value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> unit '''setUnitPosWeak''' mode </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> unit: [[Object]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> mode: [[String]] - as above </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER2</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_soldier [[disableAI]] "FSM";
_soldier [[setUnitPosWeak]] "DOWN";</code></value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[FSM]], [[doFSM]], [[setUnitPos]], [[unitPos]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value>

</value></part></template>

<h3 style="display:none">Notes</h3>
<dl class="command_description">
<comment><!-- Note Section BEGIN -->
</comment>
<dt class="note">Unknown
<dd class="note">This command is the lowest level of priority for setting unit position and to be used in scripted	
FSM's.<br>
The current priorities are:
* 1. Unit pos commanded (from the commanding menu, higher priority).
* 2. Unit pos scripted (from [[setUnitPos]] scripting command, medium priority).
* 3. Unit pos FSM / '''setUnitPosWeak''' (used in the formation FSM, lowest priority).

<comment><!-- Note Section END -->
</comment></dl>

Command most likely only works if run before [[join]] into group after [[createUnit array]].

<h3 style="display:none">Bottom Section</h3>
